achievements.name: The Journey Begins
achievements.description: Choose your starter Pokemon

achievements.name: First Steps
achievements.description: Begin your Pokemon journey

achievements.name: Junior Researcher
achievements.description: Register 10 Pokemon in the Pokedex

achievements.name: Collector
achievements.description: Register 25 Pokemon in the Pokedex

achievements.name: Pokemon Enthusiast
achievements.description: Register 50 Pokemon in the Pokedex

achievements.name: Pokedex Master
achievements.description: Register 100 Pokemon in the Pokedex

achievements.name: Johto Completionist
achievements.description: Complete the Johto Pokedex (251 Pokemon)

achievements.description: Defeat Falkner and earn the Zephyr Badge

achievements.name: Mineral Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Jasmine and earn the Mineral Badge

achievements.name: Glacier Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Pryce and earn the Glacier Badge

achievements.name: Rising Badge

achievements.name: Gym Leader Conqueror
achievements.description: Defeat all 8 Gym Leaders

achievements.description: Defeat Bruno of the Elite Four

achievements.description: Defeat Karen of the Elite Four

achievements.description: Defeat all members of the Elite Four

achievements.name: Champion Slayer: Lance
achievements.description: Defeat Champion Lance

achievements.name: Pokemon Master
achievements.description: All badges, Champion defeated, and complete Johto Pokedex
